snippet: The Convention for the proposed' Sunbury and Eric Railroad, met at Sanson-sreet Hall, this morning. A large number of the most influential businessn men of the city were present, together with a great many from the interior of the State....
lead_paragraph: The Convention for the proposed' Sunbury and Eric Railroad, met at Sanson-sreet Hall, this morning. A large number of the most influential businessn men of the city were present, together with a great many from the interior of the State.
